description:
The Backland XTD Carbon 120 is a versatile touring boot that lets you conquer any ascent. This boot is the ultimate solution for those seeking robust skiing performance in a package that excels at climbing. Engineered to dominate wider touring skis while ensuring efficient walking, the 100mm medium last accommodates natural foot movement while maintaining a secure and powerful foothold. Crafted with Prolite Technology, it boasts the slimmest possible profile and is reinforced for strength where it matters most.

  • Ultralight polyamide and carbon increases shell and cuff strength
  • Open-throat and semi-overlap shell design improves step-in and out
  • Prolite construction in the shell and cuff provides support and power transmission
  • Energy backbone reinforcements provides extra power and edge grip
  • 3D Platinum Tour liner is thermo-mouldable, hand washable and fast drying
  • Memory Fit heating technology for a fully personalized shell, cuff, and liner
  • Frictionless pivot uses polymer bushings to move naturally in walk mode
  • Free/Lock 4.5 mechanism allows 74-degree range of motion for walking
  • 13-17 degrees of forward lean for skiing
  • 2 aluminum buckles and a 40mm super light strap
  • Rockered rubber sole walks like an alpine boot
  • Compatible with Atomic Shift, and all MN, MNC, and Pin bindings
name: Atomic Backland XTD Carbon 120 Ski Boots - Unisex
